00009         public static void main(String[] args) {
00010                 double lon11 = -97.116121;
00011                 double lat11 = 32.734642;
00012

00014                 double lat22 = 32.731918;

00020 
00021         public static double distFrom(double lat1, double lng1, double lat2,
00022                         double lng2) {
00023                 double earthRadius = 3958.75;
00024                 double dLat = Math.toRadians(lat2 - lat1);
00025                 double dLng = Math.toRadians(lng2 - lng1);
00026                 double sindLat = Math.sin(dLat / 2);
00027                 double sindLng = Math.sin(dLng / 2);
00028                 double a = Math.pow(sindLat, 2) + Math.pow(sindLng, 2)
00029                                 * Math.cos(Math.toRadians(lat1))
00030                                 * Math.cos(Math.toRadians(lat2));
00031                 double c = 2 * Math.atan2(Math.sqrt(a), Math.sqrt(1 - a));
00032                 double dist = earthRadius * c;
00033                 System.out.println(dist);
00034                 return dist;
00035         }
00036 }
